DOC.brief_title: Human Ovarian Follicular Dynamics Emergency Contraception
DOC.detailed_description: This study single-center , randomize , open-label , double-controlled protocol study pattern ovarian follicular growth regression two group woman . The first group use Plan B , progesterone OC contain 0.75 levonorgestrel . The second group woman use Yuzpe regimen , use 50 mg ethinyl estradiol/0.5 mg levonorgestrel pill different stage menstrual follicular cycle .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female volunteer childbearing potential ; 2 . Are first time user oral contraception ( OC ) discontinue OC least 1 month prior study entry ; 3 . Age 18 40 year old ; 4 . Normal body mass index ( 1838 ) ; 5 . Has sign inform consent form ; 6 . Is good health confirm medical history , physical examination . 1 . A positive pregnancy test automatically exclude volunteer participation study . 2 . Any contraindication oral contraception use ; 3 . Irregular menstrual cycle ; 4 . Ultrasonographic evidence ovarian dysfunction , polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) ; 5 . Pregnancy ( suspect diagnose ) lactation ; 6 . History suspicion drug alcohol abuse ; 7 . Participation investigational drug trial within 30 day prior selection ; 8 .
